items.sentence: Please don\'t talk to the driver while he\'s driving.
Tom told Mary that her French was easy to understand.
Tom told everybody at school about what had happened.
Tom told himself that he had made the right decision.
I can\'t understand why she doesn\'t love me anymore.
My father finally learned to drive when he was fifty.
My mother has been learning French for several years.
You know that Tom used to live in Boston, don\'t you?
They wanted me to sell drugs for them, but I refused.
This camera is the one that Tom bought last Thursday.
